entry.title: Sunday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Local amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
